
 
# How to Activate Microsoft Office 2016 Permanently with Ultimate 1.7
 
Microsoft Office 2016 is one of the most popular and widely used productivity suites in the world. It offers various applications such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and more. However, to enjoy all the features and benefits of Office 2016, you need to activate it with a valid product key.

There are many ways to activate Office 2016, such as using a retail key, a MAK key, or a KMS server. But if you are looking for a simple and reliable method that works for all editions of Office 2016, you may want to try Office 2016 Permanent Activator Ultimate 1.7.
 
Office 2016 Permanent Activator Ultimate 1.7 is a program that finds and applies MAK and retail keys from different servers for Office 2016. The keys are automatically updated daily, so you don't have to worry about expiration or invalidation. This software is one of the best for Office 2016 activators with daily mak and retail key updates[^1^].
 
It also supports web activation, semi-automatic Skype activation, and KMS activation for Office 2016. It's easy to use and does not require experience to bring the activation keys to use when trying to activate the program[^1^].

In this article, we will show you how to use Office 2016 Permanent Activator Ultimate 1.7 to activate your Office 2016 permanently. Follow these steps:
 
1. Download Office 2016 Permanent Activator Ultimate 1.7 from [here](https://kcrack.com/office-2016-permanent-activator-ultimate/) or [here](https://archive.org/details/Office2016PermanentActivatorUltimate1.7). Make sure you have an internet connection and disable your antivirus or firewall temporarily.
2. Extract the zip file and run the setup file as administrator. Install the program on your computer.
3. Run the program as administrator. Click on "Get Uninstall Keys" and select the key you want to uninstall.
4. Click on "Clean Activation History" to remove any previous activation traces.
5. Select your Office edition from the drop-down menu.
6. Click on "Update Keys" to get the latest keys from the servers.
7. Click on "Install Key" to apply the key to your Office.
8. Click on "Skype Activation Now!" to activate your Office via phone.
9. Click on "Skype Account Update" to update a new Skype account.
10. Click on "Make Installation ID" to get the installation ID.
11. Click on "Start Skype" and call to +448000188354. Follow the instructions from the robot speaker and enter the verification numbers using your touch-tone pad.
12. Click on "Send Installation ID" and then click on "Send Confirmation ID". Enter the confirmation ID that the robot gives you.
13. Click on "Check Permanent Activation" to verify that your Office is activated permanently.

Congratulations! You have successfully activated your Office 2016 with Office 2016 Permanent Activator Ultimate 1.7. You can now enjoy all the features and benefits of Office 2016 without any limitations or restrictions.
